text: Hey, Sarah. I was checking the branch we worked on yesterday when I saw a problem. I think we should open an issue on GitHub. Sure, Bob. What's the problem? I pushed some changes to the repository earlier, but now the code won't compile. It's showing some strange errors. I see. Let's open an issue then. What happened when you pushed the changes? Well, I was adding a new feature. While I was pushing it, I noticed that some of the tests were failing. Got it. I'll create the issue on GitHub and write out the details. We can attach the error messages, too. Thanks, Sarah. I appreciate your help.

dialogue.text: Hey, Sarah. I was checking the branch we worked on yesterday when I saw a problem. I think we should open an issue on GitHub.
I pushed some changes to the repository earlier, but now the code won't compile. It's showing some strange errors.
I see. Let's open an issue then. What happened when you pushed the changes?
Well, I was adding a new feature. While I was pushing it, I noticed that some of the tests were failing.
Got it. I'll create the issue on GitHub and write out the details. We can attach the error messages, too.
Thanks, Sarah. I appreciate your help.
